common-expression.text: case WHEN (id=?) THEN ? WHEN (id=?) THEN ? WHEN (id=?) THEN ? end
common-expression.literal-text: case WHEN (id=3) THEN 2 WHEN (id=4) THEN 2 WHEN (id=10) THEN 2 end

common-expression.text: case WHEN (id=?) THEN ? WHEN (id=?) THEN ? WHEN (id=?) THEN ? end
common-expression.literal-text: case WHEN (id=3) THEN 'll' WHEN (id=4) THEN 'll' WHEN (id=10) THEN 'll' end
